Interface IScdClientAPI


  • public interface IScdClientAPI
    Author:
    drbruce

    • Method Detail

      • setSourceCodeData

        void setSourceCodeData(IWorkspaceHandle stream,
                     IScdPropertyFile[] scdFiles,
                     int maxUpdateWaitTime,
                     org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Replaces the existing source code data with the source code data contained in each SCD property file. If source code data does not exist for the file it will create it.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the files.
        scdFiles - List of SCD property files to replace
        maxUpdateWaitTime - The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the operation will wait for a busy stream to unlock to allow source code data updates. See IScdServiceAPI.DEFAULT_MAX_UPDATE_WAIT_TIME. A negative value will use the setting from the scan configuration for the stream.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • getSourceCodeData

        IScdPropertyFile[] getSourceCodeData(IWorkspaceHandle stream,
                                   com.ibm.team.filesystem.common.IFileItemHandle[] files,
                                   org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Retrieves the source code data for each file in the file list. If no source code data exists for a file, nothing is returned.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the files.
        files - List of file items to retrieve source code data for.
        Returns:
        A list of SCD property files for each file that has source code data
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • deleteSourceCodeData

        void deleteSourceCodeData(IWorkspaceHandle stream,
                        com.ibm.team.filesystem.common.IFileItemHandle[] files,
                        boolean scanPropertiesOnly,
                        int maxUpdateWaitTime,
                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Deletes the source code data for all the files in the file list
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the files.
        files - List of file items to delete the source code data for.
        scanPropertiesOnly - Flag indicating if only scan properties should be deleted or if both scan and non-scan (user added) properties should be deleted
        maxUpdateWaitTime - The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the operation will wait for a busy stream to unlock to allow source code data updates. See IScdServiceAPI.DEFAULT_MAX_UPDATE_WAIT_TIME. A negative value will use the setting from the scan configuration for the stream.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • appendSourceCodeData

        void appendSourceCodeData(IWorkspaceHandle stream,
                        IScdPropertyFile[] scdFiles,
                        int maxUpdateWaitTime,
                        boolean createScdIfNeeded,
                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Appends the existing source code data with the source code data contained in each SCD property file.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the files.
        scdFiles - List of SCD property files containing new properties to append
        maxUpdateWaitTime - The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the operation will wait for a busy stream to unlock to allow source code data updates. See IScdServiceAPI.DEFAULT_MAX_UPDATE_WAIT_TIME. A negative value will use the setting from the scan configuration for the stream.
        createScdIfNeeded - Flag indicating if new SCD should be created for files that currently do not have any SCD.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • replaceSourceCodeData

        void replaceSourceCodeData(IWorkspaceHandle stream,
                         IScdPropertyFile[] scdFiles,
                         int maxUpdateWaitTime,
                         boolean createScdIfNeeded,
                         org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                           throws TeamRepositoryException
        Replaces the existing source code data properties (matched by namespace and name) with the source code data properties contained in each SCD property file. If the properties do not already exist then the new properties are appended.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the files.
        scdFiles - List of SCD property files containing new properties to append
        maxUpdateWaitTime - The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the operation will wait for a busy stream to unlock to allow source code data updates. See IScdServiceAPI.DEFAULT_MAX_UPDATE_WAIT_TIME. A negative value will use the setting from the scan configuration for the stream.
        createScdIfNeeded - Flag indicating if new SCD should be created for files that currently do not have any SCD.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • scanFiles

        IScanResultAPI scanFiles(IVersionableHandle[] versionableHandles,
                       IWorkspaceHandle workspaceHandle,
                       boolean continueOnError)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Scan a list of files.
        Parameters:
        streamHandle - The stream that contains the files.
        versionableHandles - The list of files to be scanned.
        continueOnError - The flag indicating if the rest of the files should be continue scanning if an error occurred during scanning.
        Returns:
        The completed scan result. User should inspect the status of the result before interpreting the results of the scan.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If anything goes wrong
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createScdPropertyFactory

        IScdPropertyFactory createScdPropertyFactory()
        Creates a ScdPropertyFactory class used to create IScdProperty* parts
        Returns:
        An ScdPropertyFactory interface
